about_the_game:
The Journey of the Exiled

You have been banished from Heaven, branded as a heretic. Now their armies march toward you. Defeat them and ascend from Hell to the Land of Mortals, and from the Land of Mortals to Heaven. Spend the souls and gold you earned from defeating enemies to upgrade your skills and purchase items. Emerge as a stronger warrior and slay the archangels to showcase your power. For those abandoned by Heaven, salvation is something you must seize yourself.

Battles Against Endless Enemies

Defeat the endless waves of enemies to collect souls and gold. At the end of each wave, decide how to use your resources. Skills and items may work to your advantage or lead to failure depending on your enemies’ traits.

Diverse Weapon Skills

Use skill points earned through leveling up to select a variety of skills. Each character possesses 4 skills, with each skill utilizing 2 unique weapons.

Various Items

Spend coins earned by killing enemies to strengthen your character. Depending on the enemy composition, you must adapt your strategy to overcome them.

short_description: The Heretics is a 2D bullet-heaven roguelike game. Wield various weapons, slaughter swarms of enemies, collect their souls, upgrade your skills, and purchase new items to become even stronger. Survive the endless waves of crusaders and fulfill your vengeance.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
